name: Turbo Wheel
description:
It’ll be exciting to race on lush green land with thrilling obstacles to pass through in this wheelie fun adventure.

Roll down the ramp and find your way as you go. But be careful! You must dodge all the hurdles to win against your competitors. Is there a huge rock on your way? Roll away and move fast to save yourself! Keep running to stay in the lead!

Speed up the ramp and give your opponents a hard time. Keep an eye out for hurdles on your way; overtake others to reach the endpoint first.

Let’s get rollin’!

Features:
-Race on the ramp
-Roll and dodge hurdles
-Speed and reach the finish line
-Unlock new levels!
